content:
alexcrichton opened issue #6722:

This is an issue to track the implementation and support for the WIT resource type in the bindgen! macro for Wasmtime. Completing this will require https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/pull/6691 to land first as it requires all the groundwork there, but it theoretically won't be too hard after that.

alexcrichton closed issue #6722:

alexcrichton commented on issue #6722:

This was done some time ago.
